Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: old man
Reviews.Content: Man there is nothing negative I have to say about this camera. I looks at hundreds of point and shoots and read the reviews. This camera has the biggest bang for your buck over any others I looked at. The WiFi connects easily . It is extremely user friendly. Would recommend to anyone looking foe a higher end point and shoot. Great Product

ProductInfo.Features:
16.3MP 1/2.3" BSI CMOS Image Sensor
3.0" TFT LCD Hybrid Touch Screen
23.4-490.8mm (35mm Equiv) Zoom Lens
21x Optical Zoom
Capture Full HD 1080p Video
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB800F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera (Black) + 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Extra SL-B10A Battery + Carrying Case + External Rapid Charger + Table Top Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit, LCD Protector + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet
